title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.6 - Unlisted dangerous articles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.6 - Unlisted dangerous articles

State Regulations

When an article classified as dangerous is not listed
by name in section
1211.150, the restrictions shall
be determined by referring to the appropriate class name as follows: Flammable liquids, n.o.s. Combustible liquids, n.o.s. Flammable solids, n.o.s. Oxidizing materials, n.o.s. Corrosive liquids, n.o.s. Compressed gases, n.o.s. Poisonous liquid or gas, n.o.s., Class A
Poisonous liquids or solids, n.o.s., Class B
Poisonous liquids or solids, n.o.s., Class C
Radioactive materials, n.o.s. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
